item.description:
A 15 mile trail from Myles Standish to the bay was set up by a local Scout several years ago. 5 hardy souls did it in August 2009 and we've talked about it ever since but 15 miles is a lot.

Why not start at the halfway poiint?  Halfway Pond is gorgeous and Ellisville Harbor park has a great beach to rest on if you haven't seen it.

Meet at Ellisville for carpool to 9:00 start at the Mast Rd. Halfway Pond Lot. Please bring plenty of water, your lunch and maybe some bandaids for a three hour (+?) hike.    Wishbone Trail Map

Not sure but it looks like the bigger half. Maybe we'll get our wish.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Broken Wishbone Trail- now Saturday instead of Sunday
